media.credit: IBM India Pvt. Ltd. - BP NIKE

text.headline: British Petroleum NIKE
text.text:
As a developer, started my work with the development of Smartforms, Reports.

  • Worked on several outbound as well as Inbound Interfaces, reports and module pool program.
  • Worked on performance tuning for several programs.
  • Worked on enhancement points, user exits, Badi, enhancement.
  • Created FMs and done Testing.
  • Interaction with client, functional for requirement clarification and provided technical solution too.
  • Apart from several deliverables, has taken added responsibility of the team for all other activities including transport movement, cutover activities, guiding juniors

media.credit: IBM India Pvt. Ltd. - BP NIKE AD

text.headline: British Petroleum - NIKE AD
text.text:
• Provided technical guidance to juniors in the team.
  • Worked on creating class, method, persistence class to meet requirement.
  • Created Filter Badi and BADI from scratch to meet several requirements.
  • Developed ALV reports and module Pool programs.
  • Created FM and used BDC, BAPI in programs

media.credit: IBM India Pvt. Ltd. - Johnson & Johnson

text.headline: Johnson & Johnson
text.text:
As a senior consultant I have worked on:

  • ALE IDoc (Inbound and Outbound)
  • Enhancements
  • BADI, FILTER BADI
  • RICEF
  • Class, Methods, Persistent Class and very good OOPs oriented developments
  • Guiding other junior team members
  • Manage some project activities in leading role

text.headline: AlLState
text.text:
As a senior consultant I have worked on:

  • File interface and webservices
  • UI5, FIORI Application and ODATA
  • SAP HANA; FI, TREASURY, CFTE
  • Cloud & SAP S4 HANA

text.text:
